评论概述: One of the lowest-quality shirts I've ever worn
评论详情: It's difficult to know where to start.  The photos don't give any indication of how the shirt fits.  The cut is baggy and anything but athletic. I usually wear a medium, and I have a muscular build. I ordered a small and the body and arms were so baggy that it looked like I was a kid wearing my dad's clothes.  The fabric is prone to wrinkles and doesn't seem to have any stretch to it at all.  The collar is small and strangely designed – it seems impossible to lay flat or have any sort of shape because of the way it's cut and made. Starch wouldn't help.  If you were hoping for a flattering, athletic semi-formal collared shirt, this isn't it.

My son is 6'3" and 200 lbs. The shoulder and arm areas were too small for his frame and he is athletic.  We ordered a Large and are going to return it for an XL so he doesn't look like a stuffed sausage.  The feel of the fabric is nice.

评论概述: Good looking shirts but bad build.
评论详情: Bought two shirts but returned them. The front placket, which is the part that has the button holes, the material on the back side is not the shirt material,or at least not the front. When you look at the product images closely, the placket shows the shirt's print side of the fabric on the back of the placket in the ones the model is wearing them, while the close-up pics show either the back of the fabric (white color) or interfacing. I would have kept them but because of this flaw, had to return. Once you see it, you can't unsee it. It would have bugged me too much.
